sections.heading: assistants; negligent acts; liability
sections.text: Any physician or physician groups utilizing physician assistants shall be liable for any negligent acts or omissions of physician assistants while acting under their supervision.SourceLaws 1973, LB 101, ยง 14;R.S.Supp.,1973, ยง 85-179.17;Laws 1985, LB 132, ยง 13;R.
